name: Spider Panic - Attack of the monster killers
name_original: Spider Panic - Attack of the monster killers
description:
Get the first endless Virtual Reality SWARM SHOOTER for
iPhone and iPad and enjoy this pure and great action game.

This will be a new gaming experience for everyone.

This action is real! --- This game is different!
______________________________________________________

YIIEEEKK!! Monster Spiders every where! Get up your sofa and defend
your war-turret from the creeping spiders attacking you from all
directions. Holding your iPhone like a camera in your hands you shall
turn around, aim at them and hold down the trigger. Do not stand still,
because they coming slow and FAST. Alone or as a swarm. Warriors
and Jumpers. Dodgers and Mamas! Or all at once!

Use the radar to recognize from which direction they coming or just
move and look around. And do NOT forget to reload your weapon by
tapping the turret icons. Ammo unlimited! In hard situation just use your
megablast and kill all spiders at once.

How many will you kill? How long will you survive?
______________________________________________________

Main features are:
===========================
- gyroscope steering
- virtual realtiy swarm shooter
- a lot of different weapons
- different types of enemy
- different items like long radar, health kit etc.
- different worlds
- endless action
